section_title:
10c08 - Farm Credit Administration Banks and
Associations.
text:
Employees of
the following Farm Credit Administration Banks and Associations are considered
as “employees” within the meaning of FLSA and subject to its provisions in the
same manner as employees of the ordinary commercial bank or credit
establishment:  Federal Land Banks, Federal Land Bank Associations, Federal
Intermediate Credit Banks, Production Credit Associations and Banks for
Cooperatives.
html: Employees of the following Farm Credit Administration Banks and Associations are considered as “employees” within the meaning of FLSA and subject to its provisions in the same manner as employees of the ordinary commercial bank or credit establishment:  Federal Land Banks, Federal Land Bank Associations, Federal Intermediate Credit Banks, Production Credit Associations and Banks for Cooperatives.
